Pinyin
------

a with tones:  

* `r cat("\U101")`
* `r cat("\UE1")`
* `r cat("\U1CE")`
* `r cat("\UE0")`

```{r variables}
a3 <- "\U1CE"
i3 <- "\U1D0"
hello <- paste0("n",i3," h",a3,"o")
cat(hello)
```
